text: 10.29 Kis 24.8, 1 Ko 11.29, Epe 4.30, Hib 12.25, 13.20 Bɨ olap pen ne God Ñɨne nop aleb aleb ñɨl bɨ yokɨp tek lek gos nɨgup ak, ne tɨtay dɨnɨgab? Binɨb takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨŋɨd tap yokɨp tek lek tɨbɨlɨkɨpal okok, kɨli mɨŋel dɨl pɨsnep kubal ak pen, bɨ anɨb ak ne mɨŋel awl dɨl yul awl yɨbɨl dɨnɨgab. Pen ne God Ñɨne nɨkɨm ak abe nɨŋɨd tap yokɨp tek lek gos nɨgek, mɨŋel awl dɨl yul awl yɨbɨl dɨnɨgab. Taynen? Nɨkɨm anɨb ak sogek, God takaw ag adek nokom lak ak wos amnak. Amek, bɨ anɨb ak God bɨ suŋtep ne olap mɨdeb ak pen, kɨdek nɨkɨm anɨb ak tap yokɨp tek lek gos nɨgup. Pen ne God Kawnan ne ak chɨnop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gup ak nop, abe aleb aleb ñɨl agjup. Anɨb ak tek mɨŋel awl dɨl yul awl yɨbɨl dɨnɨgab.
